# <code>shape</code> for dataframe

<div class='command-title'>Shows column and row size for a dataframe</div>

## Signature

```> shape```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Shows row and column shape
```shell
  > [[a b]; [1 2] [3 4]] | into df | shape
```
